name: biomni-find-enriched-motifs-homer
title: Biomni: Find Enriched Motifs with HOMER
description: Discover DNA sequence motifs enriched in genomic regions using HOMER motif discovery
content:
Overview

Uses HOMER (Hypergeometric Optimization of Motif EnRichment) to discover de novo DNA sequence motifs that are enriched in your genomic regions compared to background sequences.

Features

  • De novo motif discovery
  • Known motif enrichment analysis
  • Comparison with transcription factor databases
  • Background correction for accurate enrichment
  • HTML output with motif logos

Genome Options

  • hg38, hg19 (human)
  • mm10, mm9 (mouse)
  • rn6 (rat)
  • dm6 (fly)
  • ce11 (worm)

Input

BED file containing genomic regions (e.g., ChIP-seq peaks)

Output

Motif PWMs, logos, enrichment statistics, and HTML report
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/genomics/find_enriched_motifs_homer.py "${peakFile}" --genome "${genome}" --motif-length "${motifLength}" --num-motifs ${numMotifs} --threads ${threads} -o "${outputDir}"
